page.title: 04INDUSTRY IN BARRINGTON
page.content: Further results of the survey under taken by the children show that of the working population 37% worked in Barrington-others working in neighbouring villages or in Taunton & Yeovil.Many had part time jobs, especially married women who undertook domestic work or glove making in their homes.Some men commuted outside Barrington to work.Apart from the men working on the land,there are the following businesses in the village- Export Merchant,Coal Merchant, Thatcher, Picture Framer,& a Worker in Wood.
